body:
"Because he was not crediting the original author of that when making a post on our forums with that held information. There is no need to have a debate on that thread as it would not turn out well. You have been a Senior Staff member before Nolan, you should know the rules."

So? Why do you guys care? The people entirely outside of Avicus, maybe give a warning but let the post stick for whatever educational value it's there for.

Nothing in the rules about it, and this was never enforced with a webban when I was staff.

Don't lock this, write your response.

replies.body: Why do you guys care? : Because this is our forums, not Reddit. The forums has rules too, and creating more and more topics complaining and just discussing about this isn't going to change anything. Anyways, it was not necessary to harass me on alternate accounts last night after you were punished accordingly for spawn blocking. Not locking this topic would just create a flame war, and we want the forums to look clean and formal to newcomers, not complaint threads like this. Please do not create another forum post regarding this.
